title: Identifying which map a character is on.

comments.author: TorquedSoul.8097
comments.body:
Looks like this discussion has been going on for a while. This link was in github,
https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/Character-position/5253349

I hope this means that map info is both feasible and is going to happen.

comments.author: TorquedSoul.8097
comments.body: Many group organization apps would benefit greatly from this simple piece of information. I recognize that exact coordinates may create some problems, but how difficult would be to add the characters current map to the API?
